GRIFrom the moment of the construction of our stores and throughout our entire operation, we have a great concern for the well-being and the development of the communities located around our units. This attitude is an important part of the success of our business and therefore, in addition to the investments made in the process of implementing each store, we seek to ensure that the enterprise generates positive impacts for all those involved, directly or indirectly.

GRIWe work with the care of mapping products that present chemical components considered dangerous and the replacement by similar ones that do not cause damages to the health or to the environment. An example of this is glyphosate-based products for killing weeds; even though they are not prohibited by law, they have been withdrawn from our stores because they pose risks to the users‚Äô health. Currently, if there is a ban on any product in France, it is automatically withdrawn from our shelves here in Brazil.
